ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The good news :)
ygData.msgSnippet: i remember those days, but ya know what? I prefer to charm. = ) I even played chanter for a good 30 min in howling stones last week when our chanter went LD.
ygData.messageBody:
i remember those days, but ya know what? I prefer to charm. = )

I even played chanter for a good 30 min in howling stones last week when our
chanter went LD.
